examples.content:
ุงูุจุชู! ุฏุฑ ุงูุฌุง ูุซุงู ฺฉุงูู ู ฺฉุงุฑุจุฑุฏ ุจุง ุงุณุชูุงุฏู ุงุฒ gr.Blocks ู ุชูุณูโุจูุฏ ุตุญุญ ุจู Row ู Column ุขูุฏู ุงุณุช:

```python
import gradio as gr

def to_uppercase(text):
    return text.upper()

with gr.Blocks() as demo:
    with gr.Row():
        input_text = gr.Textbox(label="ูุชู ุฑุง ูุงุฑุฏ ฺฉูุฏ")
        output_text = gr.Textbox(label="ูุชุฌู")
    input_text.change(to_uppercase, inputs=input_text, outputs=output_text)

demo.launch()
```

ุฏุฑ ุงูุฌุง ููููู ฺฉุฏ ุจุง ุฏฺฉูู ฺฉู ุจุง ฺฉูฺฉ ุฑู ุขู ุนุฏุฏ ุชุตุงุฏู ุจู ฑ ุชุง ฑฐฐ ููุงุด ุฏุงุฏู ูโุดูุฏุ ุจุง ุงุณุชูุงุฏู ุงุฒ gr.Blocks:

```python
import gradio as gr
import random

def random_number():
    return random.randint(1, 100)

with gr.Blocks() as demo:
    with gr.Row():
        btn = gr.Button("ุชููุฏ ุนุฏุฏ ุชุตุงุฏู")
        output = gr.Textbox(label="ูุชุฌู")
    btn.click(random_number, inputs=None, outputs=output)

demo.launch()
```
